Roles:

Role Name: impoverished_entity
Role Type: Person, Social group
Definition/Comments: one or more people who are impoverished

Role Type: State
Definition/Comments: state of impoverished_entity

Role Type:
Definition/Comments: (external) cause of impoverishment, if any

Metaphors that use this frame:

as Target frame as Source frame
  • AMOUNT OF POVERTY IS SIZE
  • AMOUNT OF POVERTY IS SIZE OF GEOGRAPHIC FEATURE
  • CAUSED IMPOVERISHMENT IS CAUSED DOWNWARD MOTION
  • ENABLEMENT OF WORSENING OF ECONOMIC CONDITION IS ENABLEMENT OF DOWNWARD MOTION
  • POVERTY IS A CRIME
  • POVERTY IS A DISEASE
  • POVERTY IS A FIERCE CREATURE
  • POVERTY IS A MOTION IMPEDIMENT
  • POVERTY IS A PLANT
  • POVERTY IS A WEED
  • POVERTY IS PHYSICAL HARM
